text:
="preserve">Julio Diamante (27 December 1930 – 1 August 2020) was a Spanish movie director and screenwriter. He directed ten movies between 1959 and 1976. His 1965 movie "El arte de vivir" was entered into the 15th Berlin International Film Festival. He also directed "Sex o no sex". Diamante was born in Cádiz, Spain.
Diamante died on 1 August 2020 in Madrid, aged 89.
